tldr_by_pl.Developer Experience 2026: Enhanced developer productivity by integrating Saarthi across nine core repositories including data-jobs, gateway-service, and planner-ui; upgraded model integration to production OpenWebUI instance with new helper scripts for DCR table schema recreation.
tldr_by_pl.DSP Core PL3: Enhanced launch capabilities with anonymous client configuration for LaunchDarkly; added Cortex Agent entry point featuring flag-based deployment control for improved system integration.
tldr_by_pl.DSP Core PL1: Enhanced order management with multi-select status filtering and persistent preferences; added forecasting channel/device/inventory validation logic for deals; patched critical vulnerability and integrated pixel audience data in Clickhouse.
tldr_by_pl.DSP Core PL5: Enhanced rate migration system with updated Peer39 2026 pricing rules; added order activation controls preventing seat separation from Boostr IO integration.
tldr_by_pl.Audiences PL2: Enhanced security infrastructure by adding dedicated IAM user/role for match-service-cron with proper access controls and automated scheduling capabilities.

body_by_pl.Developer Experience 2026:
Saarthi Code Reviewer Integration Across Major Repositories

Value Add:
• Developers now have automated code review capabilities integrated across all critical repositories including data-jobs, developer-ui, media-reporting-service, and reporting-service.
• Engineering teams benefit from consistent code quality standards and faster review cycles through AI-powered analysis across gateway-service, planner-ui, patient-planner-service, and common-service repositories.
• Production-ready OpenWebUI model integration ensures reliable and scalable code review automation for enterprise development workflows.

General Availability

Mock Data Enablement for Apache Spark Setup with Local Development

Value Add:
• Developers can now rapidly spin up local Spark environments with realistic data schemas through automated helper scripts that fetch and recreate table structures from DCR.
• Engineering productivity increases significantly as teams no longer need to manually configure complex data schemas for local testing and development.

General Availability
